segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks
segment.target: Changing the Frequency of UE-V 2.x Scheduled Tasks

segment.source: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, or 2.1 SP1 Agent installer, AgentSetup.exe, creates the following scheduled tasks during the UE-V Agent installation:
segment.target: The Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) 2.0, 2.1, or 2.1 SP1 Agent installer, AgentSetup.exe, creates the following scheduled tasks during the UE-V Agent installation:

segment.source: With the exception of Collect CEIP Data, these tasks must remain enabled as UE-V cannot function without them.
segment.target: With the exception of Collect CEIP Data, these tasks must remain enabled as UE-V cannot function without them.

segment.source: These scheduled tasks are not configurable with the UE-V tools.
segment.target: These scheduled tasks are not configurable with the UE-V tools.

segment.source: Administrators who want to change the scheduled task for these items can create a script that uses the Schtasks.exe command-line options.
segment.target: Administrators who want to change the scheduled task for these items can create a script that uses the Schtasks.exe command-line options.

segment.source: For more information about Schtasks.exe, see How to use Schtasks,exe to Schedule Tasks in Windows Server 2003.
segment.target: For more information about Schtasks.exe, see How to use Schtasks,exe to Schedule Tasks in Windows Server 2003.

segment.source: The following scheduled tasks are included in UE-V 2 with sample scheduled task configuration commands.
segment.target: The following scheduled tasks are included in UE-V 2 with sample scheduled task configuration commands.

segment.source: If upon installation the user or administrator choses to participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP), UE-V collects data to help improve the product in future releases.
segment.target: If upon installation the user or administrator choses to participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP), UE-V collects data to help improve the product in future releases.

segment.source: This scheduled task only runs at logon.
segment.target: This scheduled task only runs at logon.

segment.source: The Collect CEIP Data task runs the UevSqmSession.exe, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.
segment.target: The Collect CEIP Data task runs the UevSqmSession.exe, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.

segment.source: The Monitor Application Settings task is used to synchronize settings for Windows apps.
segment.target: The Monitor Application Settings task is used to synchronize settings for Windows apps.

segment.source: It is runs at logon but is delayed by 30 seconds to not affect the logon detrimentally.
segment.target: It is runs at logon but is delayed by 30 seconds to not affect the logon detrimentally.

segment.source: The Monitor Application Status task runs the UevAppMonitor.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.
segment.target: The Monitor Application Status task runs the UevAppMonitor.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.

segment.source: The Sync Controller Application task is used to start the Sync Controller to synchronize settings from the computer to the settings storage location.
segment.target: The Sync Controller Application task is used to start the Sync Controller to synchronize settings from the computer to the settings storage location.

segment.source: By default, the task runs every 30 minutes.
segment.target: By default, the task runs every 30 minutes.

segment.source: At that time, local settings are synchronized to the settings storage location, and updated settings on the settings storage location are synchronized to the computer.
segment.target: At that time, local settings are synchronized to the settings storage location, and updated settings on the settings storage location are synchronized to the computer.

segment.source: The Sync Controller application runs the Microsoft.Uev.SyncController.exe, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.
segment.target: The Sync Controller application runs the Microsoft.Uev.SyncController.exe, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.

segment.source: For example, the following command configures the agent to synchronize settings every 15 minutes instead of the default 30 minutes.
segment.target: For example, the following command configures the agent to synchronize settings every 15 minutes instead of the default 30 minutes.

segment.source: The Synchronize Settings at Logoff task is used to start an application at logon that controls the synchronization of applications at logoff for UE-V.
segment.target: The Synchronize Settings at Logoff task is used to start an application at logon that controls the synchronization of applications at logoff for UE-V.

segment.source: The Synchronize Settings at Logoff task runs the Microsoft.Uev.SyncController.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.
segment.target: The Synchronize Settings at Logoff task runs the Microsoft.Uev.SyncController.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.

segment.source: The Template Auto Update task checks the settings template catalog for new, updated, or removed templates.
segment.target: The Template Auto Update task checks the settings template catalog for new, updated, or removed templates.

segment.source: This task only runs if the SettingsTemplateCatalog is configured.
segment.target: This task only runs if the SettingsTemplateCatalog is configured.

segment.source: The Template Auto Update task runs the ApplySettingsCatalog.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.
segment.target: The Template Auto Update task runs the ApplySettingsCatalog.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.

segment.source: System startup and at 3:30 AM every day, at a random time within a 1-hour window
segment.target: System startup and at 3:30 AM every day, at a random time within a 1-hour window

segment.source: Example: The following command configures the UE-V Agent to check the settings template catalog store every hour.
segment.target: Example: The following command configures the UE-V Agent to check the settings template catalog store every hour.

segment.source: The Upload CEIP Data task runs during the installation if the user or the administrator chose to participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP).
segment.target: The Upload CEIP Data task runs during the installation if the user or the administrator chose to participate in the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP).

segment.source: This task uploads the data to the CEIP servers where the data is used to help improve the product for future releases of UE-V.
segment.target: This task uploads the data to the CEIP servers where the data is used to help improve the product for future releases of UE-V.

segment.source: This scheduled task runs at logon and every 4 hours afterwards.
segment.target: This scheduled task runs at logon and every 4 hours afterwards.

segment.source: The Upload CEIP data task runs the UevSqmUploader.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.
segment.target: The Upload CEIP data task runs the UevSqmUploader.exe file, which is located in the UE-V Agent installation directory.

segment.source: The following chart provides additional information about scheduled tasks for UE-V 2:
segment.target: The following chart provides additional information about scheduled tasks for UE-V 2:

segment.source: Starts 30 seconds after logon and continues until logoff.
segment.target: Starts 30 seconds after logon and continues until logoff.

segment.source: At logon and every 30 min thereafter.
segment.target: At logon and every 30 min thereafter.

segment.source: Starts the Sync Controller which synchronizes local settings with the settings storage location.
segment.target: Starts the Sync Controller which synchronizes local settings with the settings storage location.

segment.source: Runs at logon and then waits for Logoff to Synchronize settings.
segment.target: Runs at logon and then waits for Logoff to Synchronize settings.

segment.source: Start an application at logon that controls the synchronization of applications at logoff.
segment.target: Start an application at logon that controls the synchronization of applications at logoff.

segment.source: Runs at initial logon and at 3:30 AM every day thereafter.
segment.target: Runs at initial logon and at 3:30 AM every day thereafter.

segment.source: Checks the settings template catalog for new, updated, or removed templates.
segment.target: Checks the settings template catalog for new, updated, or removed templates.

segment.source: This task only runs if SettingsTemplateCatalog is configured.
segment.target: This task only runs if SettingsTemplateCatalog is configured.

segment.source: If the user or administrator opts in to the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP), this task collects data that helps improve UE-V future releases.
segment.target: If the user or administrator opts in to the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP), this task collects data that helps improve UE-V future releases.

segment.source: Runs at logon and at 4:00 AM every day thereafter.
segment.target: Runs at logon and at 4:00 AM every day thereafter.

segment.source: If the user or administrator opts in to the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP), this task uploads the data to the CEIP servers.
segment.target: If the user or administrator opts in to the Customer Experience Improvement Program (CEIP), this task uploads the data to the CEIP servers.

segment.source: Power Toggle – Task Scheduler will optimize power consumption when not connected to AC power.
segment.target: Power Toggle – Task Scheduler will optimize power consumption when not connected to AC power.

segment.source: The task might stop running if the computer switches to battery power.
segment.target: The task might stop running if the computer switches to battery power.

segment.source: Idle Only – The task will stop running if the computer ceases to be idle.
segment.target: Idle Only – The task will stop running if the computer ceases to be idle.

segment.source: By default the task will not restart when the computer is idle again.
segment.target: By default the task will not restart when the computer is idle again.

segment.source: Instead the task will begin again on the next task trigger.
segment.target: Instead the task will begin again on the next task trigger.

segment.source: Network Connection – Tasks marked “Yes” only run if the computer has a network connection available.
segment.target: Network Connection – Tasks marked “Yes” only run if the computer has a network connection available.

segment.source: Tasks marked “N/A” run regardless of network connectivity.
segment.target: Tasks marked “N/A” run regardless of network connectivity.

segment.source: To find Scheduled Tasks, perform the following:
segment.target: To find Scheduled Tasks, perform the following:

segment.source: Open “Schedule Tasks” on the user computer.
segment.target: Open “Schedule Tasks” on the user computer.

segment.source: Navigate to: Task Scheduler - Task Scheduler Library - Microsoft - UE-V
segment.target: Navigate to: Task Scheduler - Task Scheduler Library - Microsoft - UE-V

segment.source: Select the scheduled task you wish to manage and configure in the details pane.
segment.target: Select the scheduled task you wish to manage and configure in the details pane.

segment.source: The following additional information applies to UE-V scheduled tasks:
segment.target: The following additional information applies to UE-V scheduled tasks:

segment.source: ll task sequence programs are located in the UE-V Agent installation folder, , by default.
segment.target: ll task sequence programs are located in the UE-V Agent installation folder, , by default.

segment.source: The Sync Controller Application Scheduled task is the crucial component when the UE-V SyncMethod is set to “SyncProvider” (UE-V 2 default configuration).
segment.target: The Sync Controller Application Scheduled task is the crucial component when the UE-V SyncMethod is set to “SyncProvider” (UE-V 2 default configuration).

segment.source: This scheduled task keeps the SettingsSToragePath synchronized with the locally cached versions of the settings package files.
segment.target: This scheduled task keeps the SettingsSToragePath synchronized with the locally cached versions of the settings package files.

segment.source: If users complain that settings do not synchronize often enough, then you can reduce the scheduled task setting to as little as 1 minute.
segment.target: If users complain that settings do not synchronize often enough, then you can reduce the scheduled task setting to as little as 1 minute.

segment.source: You can also increase the 30 min default to a higher amount if necessary.
segment.target: You can also increase the 30 min default to a higher amount if necessary.

segment.source: You do not need to disable the Template Auto Update scheduled task if you use another method to keep the clients’ templates in sync (i.e. Group Policy or Configuration Manager Baselines).
segment.target: You do not need to disable the Template Auto Update scheduled task if you use another method to keep the clients’ templates in sync (i.e. Group Policy or Configuration Manager Baselines).

segment.source: Leaving the SettingsTemplateCatalog property value blank prevents UE-V from checking the settings catalog for custom templates.
segment.target: Leaving the SettingsTemplateCatalog property value blank prevents UE-V from checking the settings catalog for custom templates.

segment.source: This scheduled task runs ApplySettingsCatalog.exe and will essentially return immediately.
segment.target: This scheduled task runs ApplySettingsCatalog.exe and will essentially return immediately.

segment.source: The Monitor Application Settings scheduled task will update Windows app (AppX) settings in real time, based on Windows app program setting triggers built into each app.
segment.target: The Monitor Application Settings scheduled task will update Windows app (AppX) settings in real time, based on Windows app program setting triggers built into each app.

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For UE-V issues, use the UE-V TechNet Forum.
